TopicTitle: Did the KSP IRC channel get deleted?

Articles.Content: It won't load anymore, and I'd rather be able to ask little questions like this instead of having to make a whole thread about it.

i am in it right now - do you timeout or what?

edit: what client are you using?

i am in it right now - do you timeout or what?

edit: what client are you using?

Well, I'm using the same link as I always did. (https://client02.chat.mibbit.com/?url=irc%3A%2F%2Firc.esper.net%2Fkspofficial)

I also can't find it by searching, so would you be able to give me a working link?
i am there with an irc client (savIRC)
Just remove the "clientXX" and it will work
